sen.j: 廉子女王（れんし（やすこ）じょおう、生年未詳 - 承平 (日本)5年2月（935年））は、平安時代の皇族。
sen.e: Princess Renshi (Yasuko), the date of birth unknown - February 935, was a member of the Imperial Family in the Heian period.

sen.j: 仁明天皇の皇孫で、本康親王の娘。
sen.e: She was the granddaughter of Emperor Ninmyou and the daughter of Imperial Prince Motoyasu.

sen.j: 元慶元年（877年）正月従四位下に叙位され、御帳を掲げる奉仕をした。
sen.e: In January 877 she was awarded the rank of jushii-ge, performing the service of lifting the imperial curtain.

sen.j: その後時平と結婚し、藤原保忠を産んだ。
sen.e: Later she was married Tokihira, giving birth to FUJIWARA no Yasutada.

sen.j: 承平5年（935年）2月卒去時の位階は従四位だった。
sen.e: When she died in February 935 she had been promoted to the rank of jushii.

sen.j: ちなみに『貫之集』歌番号340〜350は廉子女王七十賀の時につくられた。
sen.e: Verses Nos. 340 - 350 of "The Anthology of Poems by KI no Tsurayuki" were composed on the seventieth anniversary of Princess Renshi.
